channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-14706] RegionLocationFinder should return multiple servernames by top host
item.description:
Multiple RS can run on the same host. But in current RegionLocationFinder, mapHostNameToServerName map one host to only one server. This will make LocalityCostFunction get wrong locality about region.


    // create a mapping from hostname to ServerName for fast lookup

    HashMap<String, ServerName> hostToServerName = new HashMap<String, ServerName>();

    for (ServerName sn : regionServers) {

      hostToServerName.put(sn.getHostname(), sn);

    }
item.summary: RegionLocationFinder should return multiple servernames by top host

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Attach a new patch with ut for RegionLocationFinder.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment

against master branch at commit bdf11be6af046e99cff9985968903d983d7ff10f.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12769677

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 2 new or modified tests.

-1 javac. The patch appears to cause mvn compile goal to fail with Hadoop version 2.4.0.

+ * Copyright 2010 The Apache Software Foundation

Year is not needed. Check other source file for standard license header.


+    // wait flush region

+    Thread.sleep(5000);

Can you find other approach instead of sleeping ?
Thanks. Update with v4. It doesn't need to wait region flush.
